docs.title: Welcome to my car docs
docs.text: !!! warning DISCLAIMER: This information may not be accurate and should not be used under any circumstances.

docs.title: Materials
docs.text:
• Lettering enamel
  • Pinstriping brush (00 to 4 are the range)
  • Rags
  • Mineral spirits
  • Wax and grease remover
  • Reducer

docs.title: Paint Information
docs.text: Oil-based paint is removed with mineral spirits

docs.title: New Brush
docs.text:
Rinse it off with warm water and light soap. Let it dry before using it.

Then soak it in oil.
